public class Pokemon extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a PokÃ©mon with its attributes and methods for battle mechanics.

    • Pokemon

      public Pokemon(String name, Type type, int hp, int atk, int def, int vel, int Special, int baseXp, String[] initialMoves, List<Evolution> evolutions, TypeEV typeEv)
      Constructor for a PokÃ©mon.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the PokÃ©mon.
      type - The type of the PokÃ©mon.
      hp - The base HP of the PokÃ©mon.
      atk - The base attack of the PokÃ©mon.
      def - The base defense of the PokÃ©mon.
      vel - The base speed of the PokÃ©mon.
      Special - The base special of the PokÃ©mon.
      baseXp - The base experience of the PokÃ©mon.
      initialMoves - The initial moves of the PokÃ©mon.
      evolutions - The possible evolutions of the PokÃ©mon.
      typeEv - The EV type the PokÃ©mon grants.
